divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside of my house to have a cig when i happened to look up in the sky and saw the bright lights moving in weird ways. then one right after another started to ascend on a weird angle then they followed each other and disappeared.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around December 7th 2012
Summary: i saw about 20 or so spheres moving in a way ive never seen, then ascended and disappered!
